name: MAIN HERO SHOT
prompt: eCommerce hero image: product centered and upright, filling 85–90% of a square 1024×1024 frame. Pure white background (RGB 255,255,255 / HEX #FFFFFF), perfectly uniform — no floor, no horizon, no shadow, no gradient, no table, no corner, no reflection. Studio lighting (softbox, 85mm f/8, ISO100), true colors, sharp focus, sRGB. Commercial catalog quality. If the background is not pure #FFFFFF, correct it to pure white.

name: LIFESTYLE CONTEXT
prompt: Lifestyle image: product on left side, focal point, shown in authentic real-life use with person, 50mm f/2.8, natural window light + soft fill, blurred contextual background, rule of thirds composition, warm atmosphere, clear benefit and usage story.

name: DETAIL CLOSE UP
prompt: Close-up detail: product angled right, extreme macro with 100mm f/11, side lighting enhancing textures/materials/stitching/finish, neutral gray gradient background, razor-sharp, color-accurate, premium craftsmanship showcased.

name: IN ACTION DEMO
prompt: In-action demo: product actively used or function displayed, 50mm f/4, uncluttered neutral/white/blurred background, clear human interaction if needed, well-lit, shows benefit or transformation instantly.
